mapper.sql: user_id, org_id, user_password, user_name, user_age, user_sex, user_identity, user_address, user_phone, user_mail, user_desc, user_image, user_create_time, user_create_user_id, user_update_time, user_update_user_id, user_update_password_time, user_status, user_skin, user_level, user_reserve_a, user_reserve_b, user_reserve_c

SELECT a.user_id, a.org_id, a.user_password, a.user_name, a.user_age, a.user_sex, a.user_identity, a.user_address, a.user_phone, a.user_mail, a.user_desc, a.user_image, a.user_create_time, a.user_create_user_id, b.user_name as user_create_user_name, a.user_update_time, a.user_update_user_id, c.user_name as user_update_user_name, a.user_update_password_time, a.user_status, a.user_skin, a.user_level, a.user_reserve_a, a.user_reserve_b, a.user_reserve_c FROM SYSTEM_USER a LEFT JOIN SYSTEM_USER b on a.USER_CREATE_USER_ID = b.USER_ID LEFT JOIN SYSTEM_USER c on c.USER_ID = a.USER_UPDATE_USER_ID
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) FROM SYSTEM_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into system_user (user_id, org_id, user_password, user_name, user_age, user_sex, user_identity, user_address, user_phone, user_mail, user_desc, user_image, user_create_time, user_create_user_id, user_update_time, user_update_user_id, user_update_password_time, user_status, user_skin, user_level, user_reserve_a, user_reserve_b, user_reserve_c ) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userIdentity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userCreateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{userCreateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userUpdateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{userUpdateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userUpdatePasswordTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{userStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userSkin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userReserveA,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userReserveB,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userReserveC,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
